Before all things [...] For the scripture saith [...] the ways of Sion [...] and all her gates are destroyed (?) [...] have been taken captive [...] them, their eyes have failed [...] to you [...] and John, from Epiphanius of the mount of Jeme.
Translation: W.E. Crum and H.G. Evelyn White, P.Mon.Epiph., p. 180
